article.title: Avineon Awarded Enterprise Information Technology Contract With USMC Systems Command
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Avineon Incorporated has been awarded an information technology services contract with the U.S. Marine Corps Systems Command Office of the Command Information Officer (MCSC OCIO). Under the $29 million contract, Avineon will provide ongoing technical support and management oversight of MCSC OCIO information technology operations.
